<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a2f04ee56e647d5d78d4cc9607beb72bf"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcinstrinfo">PPCInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a2f04ee56e647d5d78d4cc9607beb72bf">TII</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#acd5cf076b2f9e98086a68b9d7e0f8710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#acd5cf076b2f9e98086a68b9d7e0f8710">processBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getParent()-&gt;getRegInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a2f04ee56e647d5d78d4cc9607beb72bf">TII</a>-&gt;getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin(), IE = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != IE; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The default (A-type) VSX FMA form kills the addend (it is taken from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the target register, which is then updated to reflect the result of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the FMA). If the instruction, however, kills one of the registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used for the product, then we can use the M-form instruction (which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will take that value from the to-be-defined register).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AltOpc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a1545caeeda8de7bd87be034c59b2b9fe">PPC::getAltVSXFMAOpcode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AltOpc == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is run after register coalescing, and so we&#39;re looking for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a situation like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %5 = COPY %9; VSLRC:%5,%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %5&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %5&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %16,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%5,%17,%16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %9&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %9&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %19,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%9,%17,%19</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Where we can eliminate the copy by changing from the A-type to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// M-type instruction. Specifically, for this example, this means:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %5&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %5&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %16,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%5,%17,%16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is replaced by:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %16&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDMDP %16&lt;tied0&gt;, %18, %9,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%16,%18,%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we remove: %5 = COPY %9; VSLRC:%5,%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> FMAIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInstructionIndex(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo">VNInfo</a> &#42;AddendValNo =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(1).getReg()).Query(FMAIdx).valueIn();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can be null if the register is undef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AddendValNo)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;AddendMI = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInstructionFromIndex(AddendValNo-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo/#ae623a0f1ab59da851f2ebf1674d1fddb">def</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The addend and this instruction must be in the same block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AddendMI || AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The addend must be a full copy within the same register class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a6ee45760c97bf2dda6bee91508e6946e">isFullCopy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AddendSrcReg = AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddendSrcReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>()) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(AddendSrcReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If AddendSrcReg is a physical register, make sure the destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register class contains it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">                -&gt;contains(AddendSrcReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In theory, there could be other uses of the addend copy before this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fma.  We could deal with this, but that would require additional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// logic below and I suspect it will not occur in any relevant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// situations.  Additionally, check whether the copy source is killed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prior to the fma.  In order to replace the addend here with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source of the copy, it must still be live here.  We can&#39;t use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interval testing for a physical register, so as long as we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// walking the MIs we may as well test liveness here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: There is a case that occurs in practice, like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %9 = COPY %f1; VSSRC:%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %6 = COPY %9; VSSRC:%6,%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %7 = COPY %9; VSSRC:%7,%9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %9&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %9&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %4; VSSRC:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %6&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %6&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %2; VSSRC:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %7&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %7&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %3; VSSRC:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which prevents an otherwise-profitable transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherUsers = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, KillsAddendSrc = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = std::prev(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), JE = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>(AddendMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">             J != JE; --J) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (J-&gt;readsVirtualRegister(AddendMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OtherUsers = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (J-&gt;modifiesRegister(AddendSrcReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">              J-&gt;killsRegister(AddendSrcReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">            KillsAddendSrc = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherUsers || KillsAddendSrc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transformation doesn&#39;t work well with things like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %5 = A-form-op %5, %11, %5;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unless %11 is also a kill, so skip when it is not,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and check operand 3 to see it is also a kill to handle the case:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %5 = A-form-op %5, %5, %11;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where %5 and %11 are both kills. This case would be skipped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> OldFMAReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find one of the product operands that is killed by this instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KilledProdOp = 0, OtherProdOp = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg3 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(Reg2).Query(FMAIdx).isKill()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &amp;&amp; Reg2 != OldFMAReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">          KilledProdOp = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">          OtherProdOp  = 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(Reg3).Query(FMAIdx).isKill()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &amp;&amp; Reg3 != OldFMAReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">          KilledProdOp = 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">          OtherProdOp  = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no usable killed product operands, then this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation is likely not profitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!KilledProdOp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the addend copy is used only by this MI, then the addend source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register is likely not live here. This could be fixed (based on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// legality checks above, the live range for the addend source register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could be extended), but it seems likely that such a trivial copy can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be coalesced away later, and thus is not worth the effort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddendSrcReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">            !<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(AddendSrcReg).liveAt(FMAIdx))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (O2 &#42; O3) + O1 -&gt; (O2 &#42; O1) + O3.</span></CodeLine>
